programme.title: Chopping Mall
programme.desc: Eight teenagers are trapped after hours in a high-tech shopping mall and pursued by three murderous security robots out of control.

programme.title: Blue Eyes Of The Broken Doll [English-Language Version]
programme.desc: An ex-convict, troubled by dreams that he strangles women, is hired as the caretaker. Soon after his arrival, a serial killer begins slaughtering women.

programme.title: Asylum
programme.desc: In order to secure a job at a mental institution, a young psychiatrist must interview four patients inside the asylum.

programme.title: Studio 666
programme.desc: Legendary rock band Foo Fighters move into a mansion steeped in music history to record their next album. Once there, Dave Grohl finds himself grappling with supernatural forces.

programme.title: Into the Abyss
programme.desc: Trying to escape danger in a post apocalyptic world, Bannon realizes that his very existence will be put to the test.

programme.title: The Howling: New Moon Rising
programme.desc: A number of brutal, werewolf-like slayings begin occurring in a small California town after the arrival of an unfamiliar motorcyclist.

programme.title: Cannibal Apocalypse
programme.desc: Mentally unstable Vietnam vets who were held captive by the Vietcong come back to America after being rescued carrying a dangerous virus that turns people into cannibals when bitten.

programme.title: Sea Fever
programme.desc: The crew of a West of Ireland trawler, marooned at sea, struggle for their lives against a growing parasite in their water supply.

programme.title: Sharktopus vs. Whalewolf
programme.desc: When a mad scientist mixes the genes of a killer whale and a wolf, it creates the Whalewolf, and it's up to Sharktopus to stop it.

programme.title: Bite
programme.desc: While on her bachelorette party getaway, Casey, the bride to be, gets a seemingly harmless bite from an unknown insect.

programme.title: Deadly Hero
programme.desc: A crazed New York policeman kills a creep to save a cellist, then terrorizes the cellist.

programme.title: Hammer House of Horror
programme.sub-title: Hammer House Of Horror: S1 E12 - The Two Faces Of Evil
programme.desc: A family on holiday stop to pick up a mysterious hitch-hiker.

programme.title: Hammer House of Horror
programme.sub-title: Hammer House Of Horror: S1 E9 - The Carpathian Eagle
programme.desc: Murder victims are being found with the hearts cut out. A police detective is assigned to find and stop the killer.

programme.title: Hammer House of Horror
programme.sub-title: Hammer House Of Horror: S1 E11 - A Visitor From The Grave
programme.desc: A former mental patient kills her would-be rapist, but his corpse returns from its secret grave.

programme.title: Horror Rises From The Tomb [Spanish-Language Version]
programme.desc: An ancient warlock's spirit posseses people and forces them to commit sacrifices
